website_summaries.verdict: Hikers like these boots, but not overwhelmingly so, like the Ultra Mid 2 GTX. The Quest Prime, however, seems to be more popular among hikers who use them to cross through creeks.
pros: Seam-sealed GORE-TEX membrane ensures breathable, waterproof protection
Hardy split-suede leather and nylon upper materials for breathable, flexible, lightweight comfort
SENSIFIT™ foot wrapping promotes a snug, secure fit
Gusseted tongue helps keep debris out
Protective rubber toe cap and mud guards.Padded tongue and collar.Moisture-wicking polyester fabric lining
Dual-density EVA midsole cushions and absorbs shock
4D Advanced Chassis mid-foot support adds stability.CONTAGRIP rubber outsole supplies reliable traction over mixed terrain

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man! These fit comfortably right out of the box. They need to broken in a bit, but I just got back from a hike and I've no blisters or hot spots. They really grip the trail and I didn't have any problems on wet and somewhat icy rocks, which was a big concern for me. My other boots are definitely wore out and I have issues with severe foot pain in both feet, so to be able to hike again is wonderful. Condition of these boots is excellent and they seem to be very durable and sturdy. They also prevent me from feeling sticks and rocks underfoot. So far, I've not one complaint. Very satisfied with these boots!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are great! It took a few hikes to get my ideal lacing down - I find that I can't lace the upper part too much or my upper ankle gets bruised. Also, it helps to really kick my heal into the back before locking the laces - that way it holds but I don't have to over tighten things. I might try Salamons for my gym shoes next! I bought these after my second pair of Keen's fell apart before 2 years. These shoes are in a different class from Keen's - much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kenney

customer_reviews.title: The main reason I bought these was to wear at work and because they were actually wide enough for my super wide feet
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet due to bunions and are looking for a hiking shoe, then these are for you! The main reason I bought these was to wear at work and because they were actually wide enough for my super wide feet. They are lacking a little bit in the arch support category and could use a tad more cushioning, but they are overall great shoes! And they are waterproof which is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn R.

customer_reviews.title: and this pair is as awesome as expected
customer_reviews.text: I would give these boots 6 stars any day! I have worn Salomons hiking boots for the past many years, and this pair is as awesome as expected. I have so far tested them in Northern Europe, sub zero temps, snow and ice, NorCal pouring rains, and hilly, rocky hikes along the coast. These shoes give great support, keep your feet warm & dry, never sweaty or too hot/cold. They were a little on the cool side when it dropped to -10C, but these aren't meant for winter conditions. As long as you wear wool/smartwool/other well wicking sock, you can hike hours without blisters or any discomfort. Round laces are not my first choice, but they are easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: lizzyl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit (slightly wider toe box with I need), comfy, supports your feet well, super duty sole for backpacking...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve graduated to the big mammas - the Quest Prime GTX Backpacking! I feel confident ordering Salomon’s trail shoes (2 pr), low hiking mid and now backpacking. Oooo baby, I’m ready to tackle a Class 1 14ner LOL! Seriously, fit very comfy. I’d say 3 season (they are waterproof however). Niiiice, heavy duty, ‘Big Mama’ is taking a place on the Salomon shelf and joining all the pretty little Ladies. Will try to do a follow up after some serious mileage. All my others are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: AMaes

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: The boot has a wide toe box, but it fit just as anticipated! I love them!! They definitely have room still for thicker socks and I like having a thumb's width between the end of my toe and the end of the shoe so I don't lose my toe nails. I can see why people with narrow feet would feel the need to half size down, but I have wider feet and my usual size worked just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crrin

customer_reviews.title: I love this boot
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot! The most comfortable one I've worn thus far. Very pleased with the fit. The toe box has plenty of room for my toes (with toe sock liner and wool sock.) No binding whatsoever and I generally have trouble with my toes being cramped. I have several hundred miles on them and they still show no wear. Truly a very well made boot.
customer_reviews.author: Red HikerTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: RUNS LARGE. I’m a big fan of Salomon’s trail running shoes - I’ve owned several pairs of their Missions and Xa Pro’s and LOVE them, so I decided to give this backpacking boot a go. I am a women’s 10 in their other shoes, however, a 10 was far too large in this boot. I wore them around the house and tried them with various socks, but it wasn’t until I got them out in the trail that I realized they were, in fact, too big and wouldn’t work (lots of tripping and my foot sliding around in the boot). I ordered half a size down (9.5) and they fit like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: M. Blaha

customer_reviews.title: WAAAAY to big
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. I wear a size 7 or 7.5 in all shoes and boots, yet my feet were swimming in the 7s. Could not adjust the laces tight enough to fit. I'm returning them. I don't believe a smaller size will fit length-wise, and frankly these colors are so ugly I'm not going to bother. Note to boot manufacturers: Women don't want pink or teal hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: crude creature

customer_reviews.title: Tight toe box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8, which gave me ample length. Unfortunately, after wearing these for two weeks, my toes really started to hurt when walking down hill. I don't understand why they make hiking boots with such a narrow toe box. The previous pair of Salomon hiking boots I wore out had a wide toe box and were a great fit, but I have been unable to find those in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot- mismarked size?
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, the quality of these boots is great, they are the second pair I've owned. However, I ordered size 6.5 women's, thinking that since the last pair was 6 and fit well, a 6.5 would give me a bit of room for my new orthotic. Now, I can now wear two pairs of socks and fit a small puppy in each boot, with my foot. Kidding! But I think they must be mis-marked, or they are 6.5 in men's because they feel more like 7.5 or 8 women's.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fran

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever
customer_reviews.text: These boots rock. They were super comfortable right out of the box. I put 7 miles on them day 1 and no blisters or sore spots at all. They are narrow in the heel and wide in the toe, so my feet stay put and my toes have plenty of space. Really important when hiking if you like having toenails to paint. I ordered a half size smaller than I usually wear after reading other reviews and they are perfect. I would recommend these to anybody with a narrow foot that still wants plenty of room for their toes. It's really hard to find both and these boots definitely hit the sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best hiking boot I got in every way possible
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with a hiking boot...all the descriptions you reed about in their site are right. Normally I am a size 91/2 in Nike sneakers I got size 81/2 in those boots so I believe they run large. Definitely very comfortable to go up or down the mountains in them and they are really waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife's first boot
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing for my wife. We had to reorder a smaller size. She wears an 8.5 in Solomon X-Ultra lows, so we ordered the 8.5 in the Quest Prime GTX. It was huge on her foot. We found an REI where we could try them on and strangely, the 7.5 was the best fit, which is what she wears in normal street shoes. She has not hiked in them yet. But she has worn them around the house for many hours and finds them comfortable and solid. We like the Solomon boots and shoes as they are always well built and perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hiking boots I have ever worn. I followed the comments on size/fit and they are a perfect fit for my narrow heels and wide toes. I recommend these as a great boot. I have high arches and they are just right.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Hunting/hiking
customer_reviews.text: My wife is picky when it comes to bucking boots and she really likes these boots. I have a pair of men’s and they provide excellent support and are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Summers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second pair of these boots and find them to be extremely good quality and comfortable. I bought the 9 1/2 larger size I have extremely thin heels and the fit is still good.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I am in rain boots
customer_reviews.text: I had Salomon boots before, and ordered the same size. These were slightly bigger in size, but huge, just HUGE in looks. Half an inch longer than my old ones. I felt like I am in rain boots. I was sad to return them and try a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia

customer_reviews.title: These fit perfect and I love them
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and I love them. They are so comfy and they look great. I bought them for my summer internship because we're going to be outside a LOT and I needed reliable shoes that could handle the terrain. These shoes look like they'll do just fine, food quality and made for rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Enos

customer_reviews.title: No more feet pain after hiking
customer_reviews.text: Best hiking boots ever. I tried them all, Salomon takes the cake. Bought them a backpacking trip at the end of May this year, used for day hikes so far. All other boots I owed Merrells, Keen’s in the past I always ended up with blisters, feet psi and black toe nails, not with this boots, my feet didn’t even hurt after a long hike. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: N Carmen V

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE BOOT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best boot ever!!! It is awesome and very comfortable. Ordered my normal size, it is roomy. But that's great if you want to where thick warm socks. Other wise it is good for regular socks too. If you want a snug fit I'd say order a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Didnt need much breaking in before my backpacking trip. i did happen to cross many creeks and my feet were still dry. Although at one point i fell into the river waist deep and although water was inside my boot they dried in the sun within 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lanisha

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Provides support and I wore them without ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Provides support and I wore them without breaking them in with no blisters. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots at a really affordable price. Comfortable and well made- good for all kinds of hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Salomon boots fit beautifully. I have learned to try Salomon boots before ...
customer_reviews.text: I have small, wide feet. Salomon boots fit beautifully. I have learned to try Salomon boots before anything else. I also have Salomon ski boots and they’re the most comfortable boots I’ve ever owned...and I’m 70!
customer_reviews.author: Rhubarb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is very high. Will end up having to return them
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: For backpacking I wanted a bit of a heavier boot ...
customer_reviews.text: For backpacking I wanted a bit of a heavier boot than the Salomon Ultra Mid 2 GTX which are my hiking boots. Wore them on a 10 mile backpacking trip right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Hiked 12 miles in these right out of the box. Toe box is perfect and no pain on the downhills. Great traction!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Palacios

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much! Tried them on at REI and got them cheaper on here and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Always loved this brend ! Boots fit great. Everything as good as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me and my feet. Sturdy, stable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing boots, and require little to no Break in period.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC A DAMM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for hiking. Worth every penny. Waterproof (I have walked through low creeks in them), durable, comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: AmyM.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The were like pillows on my feet. Great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! Fit well. Didn't bother to break these boots in and did a 7 mile day hike over rough terrain and not a blister to be found. Good ankle support and light. So glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Whitley cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Great boots but runs a bit large for me
customer_reviews.text: I really love Salomon for the fit, quality, incredible comfort, and the huge toe box, which is really important especially for longer hikes (over 15 miles a day). I've owned 4-5 pairs of hiking boots, and tried a lot more in store, the Salomon boots are always the most comfortable ones I've owned/tried. I found these running a bit too large for me. I know Solomon usually makes the shoes larger to provide large toe box to make sure the toes don't touch the front of the shoes on downhill, but these are still a bit too large. I ended up returning these. But still these are great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect. Plenty of room in the toe box but ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect. Plenty of room in the toe box but they're not too big. The lacing is designed perfect to keep them from sliding and causing blisters. I can't wait to try them out with some real hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri VanBilliard Walpert

customer_reviews.title: root and rock terrain and they are fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: Already have 20 miles (3 days) in these boots to include bald mountains, rocky cliffs, root and rock terrain and they are fantastic...not a blister, no foot fatigue...hoping they last
customer_reviews.author: Laura Casey

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, but great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They are super lightweight, but they run large, so be sure to order a half size or full size smaller than you usually do.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Slightly wider than others which is good for my foot
customer_reviews.text: Slightly wider than others which is good for my foot. Reasonably priced. Do not require a lot of break in time. Lighter than expected :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Haley

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I was hoping for a better fit. I have a small fit and salomons ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was hoping for a better fit. I have a small fit and salomons have worked for skiing and other activities. However my foot was just swimming in these even with the smallest size. Found a pair of Lowa boots instead.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the Salomon fit. Be sure to follow the sizing recommendations. This model boot is light. Good looking. Hikes well. I just need to shorten the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Language Lover

customer_reviews.title: ... is superb and the first hike wearing them was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is superb and the first hike wearing them was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I where a 7.5, but the 6.5 fit so much better. They run really large.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: Weather protection at it's greatest
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them and she will be wearing at the airport to keep her feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hiking boots I have had. They give good support and they have a roomy toe box. I have difficult feet to fit--narrow ankles and wide toes. The Salomon boots work fine. Right now I'm wearing them for short hikes to break them in for an upcoming trip to Glacier National Park. I don't expect any blisters on longer hikes.
customer_reviews.author: nance

customer_reviews.title: The boots are very durable and sturdy. I have not tried them out in water ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very durable and sturdy. I have not tried them out in water to check for level of waterproofness.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla M

customer_reviews.title: STILL DELIBERATING
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on these boots I haven't really had a chance to wear them but on an initial tryout and fit they seem a little bulky and stiff I am hoping that they break in overtime they are slightly large in the toe area and that concerns me
customer_reviews.author: Penny007

customer_reviews.title: Love my Salomon trail runners, so tried these...
customer_reviews.text: Have done two small (8mile) hikes with absolutely no problems. I have ankle issues so need a boot now rather than trail shoes i usually hike in.... but love my Salomon so tried these. LOVE. Will update if any issues. Only had a few days so far....
customer_reviews.author: moozeeklvr

customer_reviews.title: but these feel like two sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size, but these feel like two sizes larger. I will be returning. Also, they seem very stiff and would take a long time to be comfortable. Price was reasonable, and they are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: slorn

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to test on a strenuous hike but just tooling around so far they have been comfortable. Nice looking shoes on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I sized down half a size and they fit well. I think if I had of gone a full size down they would have been a bit tight. I have yet to test on a strenuous hike but just tooling around so far they have been comfortable. Nice looking shoes on my feet......at such a bargain price I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaffa

customer_reviews.title: The 7 fit perfect and I can wear a padded hiking sock with ...
customer_reviews.text: This boot does run about a half size bigger. I read the other reviews and thank goodness I did. I wear a size 7.5 and ordered the 7. The 7 fit perfect and I can wear a padded hiking sock with these and they still feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jere S. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these boots, I'm normally size 9, sometimes bigger but these have good room. Just right, I can wear thicker socks and not be squished! Comfortable from the first wear. Orthasoles innersoles are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: The cushion on the ankles were the main source of ...
customer_reviews.text: The cushion on the ankles were the main source of my foot issue, and I only hiked for about 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but they hurt my ankles after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fit but they hurt my ankles after a few miles of hiking. Shaft is higher than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, comfy, durable.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a small man. When I discovered these (women’s) boots in REI, I’ve been wearing them ever since. Perfect fit, every time. Waterproof, comfy, durable.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Sylvester

product_meta.title: Salomon Women's Quest Prime GTX W Backpacking Boot
product_meta.description:
If you treat backpacking like a sport, quest prime gtx® for women is the boot that gets you more wins. Super light and designed for optimum cushioning and protection, you'll be able to go faster and farther in total comfort.

Salomon was born in 1947 in the heart of the French Alps and the birthplace of modern alpinism. Driven by a passion for skiing and design innovation, Francois Salomon and his son George designed and perfected much of the first modern ski equipment. During the following 60 years, Salomon's commitment to innovative design and passion for mountain sports created a vast range of revolutionary new concepts in boots, skis and apparel and brought innovative solutions to footwear, apparel and equipment for hiking, adventure racing, mountaineering and trail running. Through performance-driven design, Salomon enhances mountain sports by converting new ideas into action and expanding the limits of possibility.
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof Split Suede Leather, Water Resistant Textile
A lighter boot makes for an easier journey. At only 570g, Quest Prime GTX is one of the lightest boots in the backpacking category.
A rubber toe cap protects feet from all kinds of hazards. A GORE-TEX membrane ensures breathable weather protection. Great cushioning for long distance comfort.
Bridging the span between mountain heritage and athletic design cues. Salomon DNA expressed in this progressive yet clean silhouette.
